item.description:
Due to a change in plans, we will not be able to host a meetup in November. As we never have a meetup in December, our next meetup will be in January... See you then!

In the meantime, join us on Facebook (A Place of Light) for our weekly exercise and to be a part of a loving and supportive community!

As always, e-mail me about any questions you may have in regards to linking with spirit.

dance in the light,

Susan
item.name: No Meetup until January
